body: @mike1011 , thanks , looks like we forgot  to include  [this method](https://github.com/activeadmin/activeadmin/blob/5b711b6e22230e6e28be2a9d7367e9423d5dcc25/lib/active_admin/resource.rb#L163) to [page class](https://github.com/activeadmin/activeadmin/blob/5b711b6e22230e6e28be2a9d7367e9423d5dcc25/lib/active_admin/page.rb)
Hi @Fivell, Let me know,when i can again point to the latest master branch .as of now i have fixed this error again pointing to 1.0.0.pre2...which is not good as i need to use master.

@mike1011 , can you show how are you handling sorting within page?

``` table_for @request_edits, sortable: true do```

Thanks @Fivell , i am pointing it to `gem 'activeadmin', git: 'https://github.com/Fivell/activeadmin.git' , :branch => 'issue_4902' ` and its working too.

I will love to get this in the master ? :)

@mike1011 , will be merged after review
cc @varyonic

issue.title: fixes #4902, allow to use sortable tables within pages

repository.name: activeadmin
repository.description: The administration framework for Ruby on Rails applications.

body:
Now .i am using the master branch and its working great.

`gem 'activeadmin', git: 'https://github.com/Fivell/activeadmin.git'`

Thanks

@mike1011 this is how it should be
```
gem 'activeadmin', git: 'https://github.com/activeadmin/activeadmin.git'
```
